member.name: M:AirArena.Data.DataConnector.#ctor
member.summary: Please ensure that your config file has a ConfigSection as defined at http://schemas.airarena.com.au/config/DataConnector/200709/AADataConnector.xsd eg: Place <section name="AirArenaDataConnectorConfig" type="AirArena.Data.Configuration.AirArenaDataConnectorConfig, AirArenaData" /> in the <configSections> section of your config file. <configSections> must appear immediately after the root <configuration> node. After the </configSections> place your <AirArenaDataConnectorConfig> section for example: <AirArenaDataConnectorConfig xmlns="http://schemas.airarena.com.au/config/DataConnector/200709/AADataConnector.xsd"> <Connectors> <Connector Prefix="YourProjectIdentifier" ConnectionString="Data Source=Localhost;Initial Catalog=YourDatabases;User Id=User;Password=Password" FactoryVariant="MSSQL"/> </Connectors> </AirArenaDataConnectorConfig> There can be any number of <Connector>s but each must use a unique Prefix

member.name: M:AirArena.Data.DataConnector.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Please ensure that your config file has a ConfigSection as defined at http://schemas.airarena.com.au/config/DataConnector/200709/AADataConnector.xsd eg: Place <section name="AirArenaDataConnectorConfig" type="AirArena.Data.Configuration.AirArenaDataConnectorConfig, AirArenaData" /> in the <configSections> section of your config file. <configSections> must appear immediately after the root <configuration> node. After the </configSections> place your <AirArenaDataConnectorConfig> section for example: <AirArenaDataConnectorConfig xmlns="http://schemas.airarena.com.au/config/DataConnector/200709/AADataConnector.xsd"> <Connectors> <Connector Prefix="YourProjectIdentifier" ConnectionString="Data Source=Localhost;Initial Catalog=YourDatabases;User Id=User;Password=Password" FactoryVariant="MSSQL"/> </Connectors> </AirArenaDataConnectorConfig> There can be any number of <Connector>s but each must use a unique Prefix
member.param: Place a <Connector> in the <Connectors> section of the <AirArenaDataConnectorConfig> section of your config file with a Prefix the same as passed in to this parameter. Prefix can be left blank both here, and in the config file.
